content:
I'm glad you mentioned that! Replacing light bulbs can make a huge difference in the ambiance of a room, and it's often an easy and affordable way to give your space a refresh.

Now, about online retailers and stores, I've got some recommendations for you!

1. **West Elm:** West Elm is a great destination for modern and minimalist lamps. They offer a wide range of styles, from sleek and industrial to more ornate and decorative.
2. **Crate & Barrel:** Crate & Barrel is another excellent option for finding high-quality, designer lamps with a minimalist aesthetic. They often feature collaborations with well-known designers, so you can find unique and stylish pieces.
3. **AllModern:** AllModern is an online retailer that specializes in modern and contemporary design. They offer a vast selection of lamps from various brands, including Muuto and Flos, which I mentioned earlier.
4. **Lumens:** Lumens is an online retailer that offers a wide range of lamps from various brands, including their own in-house label. They have a great selection of modern and minimalist lamps, and they often offer competitive pricing.
5. **Design Within Reach:** Design Within Reach is a high-end retailer that offers a curated selection of designer lamps from brands like Flos, Artemide, and more. They often feature limited-edition collaborations and exclusive designs.

These retailers often offer online exclusives, sales, and promotions, so be sure to check their websites regularly for deals.

If you prefer to shop in-store, you can also try visiting local furniture stores or design boutiques in your area. They may carry a selection of lamps that fit your minimalist aesthetic.

Remember to read reviews, check the product descriptions, and look for high-quality materials and construction when making your purchase. Happy lamp shopping!
